item.title: Southwest and activist investor Elliott strike deal to keep CEO Bob Jordan, add six new directors

item.title: China's steel exports expected to falter in 2025 as pain from tariffs spread
item.description: Steel producers in China face a double-whammy of mounting overseas tariffs and weakened domestic demand at home.
